sql.name: queryXhHouseLoanAuditInfoList
sql.sqlString: select a.HOUSE_TYPE,/*房屋性质*/ a.HOUSE_EVALUATE_VALUE,/*房屋评估价值*/ a.CREDIT_VISIT_FEE,/*信访费*/ a.ALL_FEE_RATE,/*综合费率*/ a.SERVICE_FEE_RATE,/*服务费率*/ a.MONTH_RATE,/*月利率*/ a.LOAN_MONTH,/*贷款期数*/ a.SIGN_CONTRACT_DATE,/*签约日期*/ a.HOUSE_LOAN_APPLY_ID,/*借款申请ID*/ a.HOUSE_LOAN_ADUIT_ID,/*借款审核ID*/ a.CHARGE_TYPE,/*收费方式*/ a.CONTRACT_MONEY,/*合同金额*/ a.ID from XH_HOUSE_LOAN_AUDIT_INFO a where 1=1 $sql
